Review.Titre: Spanel is Not Stable + ask to pay for support for their own bugs
Review.Contenu: Spanel is not stable they offer an interface that doesn't properly work, for example we use Spanel for email and apparently certificate doesn't renew automaticaly support doesn't want to correct and investigate the issue because they say we need to pay for advanced support. We'll switch to cpanel, they don't get the business plan there. Terrible enterprise.

Review.Titre: 3 times I try to register a domain and…
Review.Contenu: 3 times I try to register a domain and everytime they Homepage make Problems. Very very very bad. And all the positive reviews I think they are the player of scalahosting
I like your support, but the product itself I'm not satisficed because the speed of the server not okay so that I downgrade my vps from $110 to $49.95 at the end both of them are same.

Review.Titre: VPS is the way to go
Review.Contenu: I initially had a bad experience with their standard business email packages (which btw are on a shared server) due to downtime and getting blacklisted. I opted to upgrade to their VPS hosting, which included email. This had some additional features which I could use, but also provided a much better service for my customers.

Review.Titre: Online Staff Helpful - - Supporting Documentation Not So Much
Review.Contenu: Online staff are quick to respond (que times are short), and they ask you to explain your question / problem to target a response. BUT then they just give you one piece of the puzzle. It would be more helpful if they could say "Oh you are trying to do X. Have you seen our great "how to" writeup on that at http://blahblahblah?" And the reason they can't do that is there isn't one. Wix and other similar service providers have great articles and videos on for example hosting with ScalaHosting while you keep your domain name and email somewhere else. Scala just wants you to switch everything to them ($$$) and are not helpful with other scenarios. Bad on them.

Antonio I. was very profession and patient in dealing with my issue. I like their service. They transparent and respond to chats quickly.Edited: If you are looking for a reliable and fast server, Scalahosting is great. Their support is efficient at resolving and responding to ticket very fast.But I had to leave when the refused downgrade migration. They demanded I pay $40 and later $20 to migrate my sites to a lower plan. But they migrate free if I was transferring from a different hosting or upgrading. I suppose they do this to prevent customers from downgrading but that's a dumb move because they will end up losing customers that would have stayed loyal for years on a plan they can afford. They forget their price is high and there are competitions with far less prices and efficiency than them. My sites weren't earning so downgrading was necessary for me. If they ever change this policy in future, I will return.

No down-time at all! My website is always "ON!!"Even though my website is not an eCommerce website, but I will truly know how powerful ScalaHosting is when I bring in two (2) eCommerce websites coming very soon.If you still prove yourself, then I will give your service "5-STARS" review next time-ok!!!

Review.Titre: Insightful Review: What's Essential to Know About ScalaHosting
Review.Contenu: I've been with ScalaHosting for over a year now, and I'm genuinely pleased with the hosting services they provide. From my experience, they deserve a solid 4-star rating.Pros:1.Reliable Uptime: One of the standout features of ScalaHosting is their exceptional uptime. My website has rarely experienced any downtime, which is crucial for my online business. This reliability has boosted my confidence in their services.2.Speed and Performance: My website loads quickly and smoothly, even during high traffic periods. This has undoubtedly contributed to a positive user experience for my visitors.3.Customer Support: I've had a few technical queries along the way, and the customer support team at ScalaHosting has been a great help. They respond promptly, and their representatives are knowledgeable and friendly.4.Easy-to-Use Control Panel: The control panel is user-friendly, making it easy to manage my website settings, domains, and other features. Even for someone who's not tech-savvy, navigating the control panel is a breeze.Cons:Pricing: While the service quality is excellent, the pricing is slightly on the higher side compared to some competitors. However, considering the reliability and features they offer, I believe it's worth the investment.Overall, I'm quite satisfied with my experience with ScalaHosting. The minor drawbacks are outweighed by the top-notch service and support they provide. If you're looking for a hosting company that prioritizes uptime, performance, and customer assistance, ScalaHosting is definitely worth considering.
Their customer service is very responsive and helpful.  I found their billing confusing.  I changed packages and ended up with 2 invoices - other than that no problems at all.

Review.Titre: Antonio and George T very exceptional support
Review.Contenu: Thanks to Antonio and George T. Exceptional support! The representatives was highly responsive, patient, and persistent in resolving my issue. Kudos to them!
This is one of my fev hosting provider and i like it so much

Review.Titre: I have a few months using it
Review.Contenu: I have a few months using it, the support is honest and great, my only concern ins on how they manage the servers sometimes rhe server down and was because a mistake of a tecnician on configuration, they fix that things but i dont want keep writing to support for the server problem, for that i cant move more serious bussiness to scala.Still for me for medium size bussiness is good.

Review.Titre: Small email upgrade and domain transfer help.
Review.Contenu: I had been using a small email hosting and decided to transfer my domain to Scala as well. The online chat help operator (Valentin N) was very helpful as we navigated this change. He also helped me obtain a discount on my upgraded email hosting.I'd recommend you offer promo pricing to current customers who upgrade their plans. This would help retain them and gain an advantage over those competitors who offer incentives to leave Scala. Valentin was able to help, after a long chat session, and we are now happy to stay with Scala. The 24/7 online chat support made the difference between staying with Scala and leaving to one of their competitors.

Review.Titre: Any time we have any problems or any…
Review.Contenu: Any time we have any problems or any need for anything these guys get right on it. They have given us support for every problem in less than an hour and have gone so far our of their way to ensure we are satisfied with their services. Compared to the others, Scala give more bang for the buck in their different hosting packages. Other web hosts limit how many domains you can use and then give you great amount of bandwidth.

Review.Titre: I am a ScalaHosting client since May…

Review.Titre: the best for over 10 years now!
Review.Contenu: been with ScalaHosting since early 2009 - and must admit, that thru these years, among all tested hostings, this is the one I trust and like the most :) there were some minor issues from time to time, but also were quite quickly solved with a hint or help from the staff which can answer blazingly fast no matter when you send a support ticket.so why the -1 star you'll ask? well, I believe that even perfect things can still be better, so I just leave room for another great innovations that ScalaHosting would apply in the future! :)

Review.Titre: Scalahosting - my experiences with Cloud VPS hosting
Review.Contenu: I switched to Scalahosting Cloud VPS recently after years of shared hosting with a different hosting provider.There are lots of hosting companies out there and I had to make a decision between several and eventually I went to scalahosting. What was good: Smooth and easy transfer of >20 domains for free, contacted the service many times already and quick responses. Currently setting up CDN and Dimitar helped me more than once already but I have to say that the whole stuff of support is doing a great job.If you are looking for a great solution for your (Wordpress) Websites and you are fed up with shared hosting, the Cloud VPS is definitely worth a try.

Review.Titre: Scala Hosting is maybe not the cheapest…
Review.Contenu: Scala Hosting is maybe not the cheapest one hosting service provider, but it is the most affordable one. Their support is unmatchable with others. I never waited more than 15 mins for any problem I had at any time of day, any day of year. Mr. Valentin N. gave me excellent support - as expected!

I wish I could remember ALL the individuals that I have spoken to in all my time on Scalahosting. What names I do remember is Rali M. and Valentin N. They have been extremely patient, kind, and very helpful. Despite my guilt in asking stupid questions as a long day of work can make your brain turn to mush, they have not been judgemental and rather very supportive. Super straight to the point and FULL of information. Thank you to ALL that I spoke with!

Review.Contenu: My experience with Maria was 5 stars because, unlike some of her male colleagues, she took over the situation and she resolved my problem while I was panicking, instead of merely posting a link with instructions on how to deal with it.It would have sufficed that she gave me some guidance but she went the extra mile and beyond.Very grateful and I must say I was already looking for another hosting provider. People like her should be the standard rather than the exceptions.

I have dealt with multiple tech people  at ScalaHosting and they are all excellent.  Most recently Todor P. saved the day for me when I made a configuration mistake that he quickly figured out and fixed.  Todor was very knowledgeable, patient, and quick to respond.  Thanks again ScalHosting!  I will be migrating my other domains very soon!  You guys rock!

Review.Titre: A Deep Dive into My Stellar Journey with Scala Hosting
Review.Contenu: Setting Sail in 2016: A Leap into the UnknownIn the tumultuous world of web hosting, Scala Hosting emerged as my guiding light in 2016. Disenchanted by the letdowns from redacted, redacted, and redacted, I took the leap into the unknown. Little did I know, Scala Hosting was about to redefine my expectations of what a hosting provider could be.From Shared to Reseller Bliss: More Than Just PlansStarting with shared hosting and eventually delving into the reseller program, Scala Hosting seamlessly facilitated my transition. It wasn't just about acquiring hosting plans; it was about establishing a robust and mutually beneficial hosting relationship. Their reseller program not only met my needs but exceeded them, offering not just services but an ecosystem of support.Cloud VPS Upgrade: When Things Got ViralThe turning point in our journey together occurred when one of my main accounts experienced an unexpected surge in popularity, demanding more resources. Scala Hosting didn't just wait for me to react; they took the proactive step of suggesting an upgrade to a cloud VPS account. What sealed the deal for me was their commitment to transparent pricing – no hidden fees, just honest service. The migration process was not just smooth but reflective of a hosting provider that truly understood the value of a hassle-free experience.Reseller Program Magic: Beyond the BasicsExpanding my VPS to accommodate all client sites was made not only possible but surprisingly easy with Scala Hosting's support team. What set them apart was their willingness to go above and beyond, migrating shared accounts at no extra cost, even those beyond the Scala Hosting umbrella. This level of commitment is a rare gem in an industry often characterized by a lack of personal touch.Tango with Malware: Support to the RescueIn a moment of oversight, I unintentionally uploaded a null theme, leading to a malware infection. Scala Hosting's scanning service not only detected the issue promptly but provided a secure channel for me to rectify the situation. The support team proved to be true heroes during this crisis, locating the source of the malware, guiding me through the resolution process, and transforming what could have been a nightmare into a manageable situation. Their assistance was not just technical; it was human.Learning the Ropes: Support Beyond the Call of DutyWhile I wasn't a complete novice, Scala Hosting's support team played a crucial role in elevating my understanding of hosting intricacies. They patiently imparted knowledge and extended their assistance to issues that extended beyond their immediate responsibilities. It was not just about fixing problems; it was about empowering me to navigate the hosting landscape with confidence.SPanel Game-Changer: Innovation in ActionWhen cPanel's licensing became a hurdle, Scala Hosting responded with SPanel – a game-changer that not only matched cPanel's features but surpassed them. The support team showcased their commitment to innovation by manually implementing a solution for a missing feature, demonstrating their dedication to ensuring their services evolve to meet user needs.The Inbox Chronicles: 778 Emails and Still SmilingWith 778 emails exchanged, a significant portion being support tickets, Scala Hosting has consistently demonstrated unwavering dedication to fulfilling my demands. Despite being a demanding customer, I have never experienced disappointment. Each interaction reinforced my confidence in Scala Hosting's commitment to customer satisfaction.Final Act: Scala Hosting - The Hosting Fairy GodmotherIn a nutshell, Scala Hosting isn't merely a hosting provider; it's a partner in my digital journey. With competitive prices, cutting-edge features, and a support squad that transcends technical assistance to become a tech fairy godmother, there's simply no incentive to explore alternatives. Scala Hosting has not just met but exceeded my hosting expectations, and I eagerly anticipate continuing this seamless and fulfilling journey.Cheers to hassle-free hosting,

Great! The representative was very good and very knowledgeable.Follow up to my previous review...I intended to came here on this Trustpilot site not to add a rating or withdraw a rating I had previously given. Because my experience in my previous inquiry was that the representative answered my questions well. What I lost on my previous inquiry is I had misinterpreted their product offering, especially the premium features they claim. That is what I want to make an emphasis it now.In fact, they offer no Free Domain or Real Time Malware Protection. Even the other Hosting companies that sell this type of product. Check and think carefully about what they say the Free Domain of their current price now with the premium features they offered. Ask how much the price will be after the renewal rate upfront for 1 year if you intended it for a year only.I purchased from ScalaHosting their product WP Start with the amount price of $5.95/mo the total amount for 1 year is $71.40. I think I got that the less price, but the whole thing was that it didn't have the features. They just subtract all its features, and they do as a feature for their premium price. If you can't check the true price the trick there is you will go after the product because of the features, the Free Domain and Real Time Malware Protection, and this is indeed I fall into my wrong interpretation.Regularly, the price of WP Start after renewal is $11.95/mo the total amount for 1 year is $143.40. It probably includes what they say is Free Domain and Malware Protection. If you do the computation of the full total price for 1 year of WP Start product, there is really NO Free Domain and Malware Protection as they claimed in their promo. That's just only part of their marketing strategy to get more sales.Even the other hosting companies that sell this type of product the kind of features they offer really don't exist. Since, I just started with ScalaHosting, let's just see their hosting performance if it's good before the end of the month comes. And I hope I'm not wrong in my choice of choosing ScalaHosting.

When I initially contacted Scala Hosting, I was immediately greeted with genuine warmth and professionalism. The customer service representative went above and beyond to make me feel valued as a customer and ensured that my concerns were attentively heard. What truly set Scala Hosting's customer service apart was their commitment to going the extra mile. Not only did they promptly address my initial concern, but they also took the time to provide additional guidance and suggestions to optimize my overall hosting experience. This dedication to surpassing expectations showcases their genuine interest in the success and satisfaction of their customers.
Ross in support, helped resolve an issue for me, quickly and first time up, so greatly appreciate the knowledgeable and quick resolution to problem I was facing!
best support but not recover my email your team for utcbd.net,
